messages.message:
Update: with this change (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/52900), these decorators will determine if it should return v1 or v2 error response in the decorator itself, based on the request URL (`api/v1/...` or `api/v2/....` ). Thus, we no longer have `@verify_credentials(..., is_v2=True), @license_required_v2, @license_enabled_v2`
As a reminder, use:
• `@verify_credentials` for authentication
• `@license_enabled` for checking if the env has license-service enabled
• `@license_required` for checking if the user/org has a valid license
